operation.name: InsertOrUpdate
operation.sql: INSERT INTO user_peer_settings (user_id, peer_type, peer_id, hide, report_spam, add_contact, block_contact, share_contact, need_contacts_exception, report_geo, autoarchived, geo_distance) VALUES (:user_id, :peer_type, :peer_id, :hide, :report_spam, :add_contact, :block_contact, :share_contact, :need_contacts_exception, :report_geo, :autoarchived, :geo_distance) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE report_spam = VALUES(report_spam), add_contact = VALUES(add_contact), block_contact = VALUES(block_contact), share_contact = VALUES(share_contact), need_contacts_exception = VALUES(need_contacts_exception), report_geo = VALUES(report_geo), autoarchived = VALUES(autoarchived), geo_distance = VALUES(geo_distance), hide = 0

operation.name: Select
operation.sql: SELECT user_id, peer_type, peer_id, hide, report_spam, add_contact, block_contact, share_contact, need_contacts_exception, report_geo, autoarchived, geo_distance FROM user_peer_settings WHERE user_id = :user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id AND hide = 0

operation.name: Update
operation.sql: UPDATE user_peer_settings SET cMap = :cMap WHERE user_id = :user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id

operation.name: Delete
operation.sql: UPDATE user_peer_settings SET hide = 1 WHERE user_id = :user_id AND peer_type = :peer_type AND peer_id = :peer_id
